means: 使分心(distract的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: Few things distracted the Pastor from the preparation of his weekly sermons.
sentence.Network_cn: 几乎没有什么事情能使牧师在准备每周的布道时分神。

sentence.Network_en: She seemed less like a poetess than a distracted housewife.
sentence.Network_cn: 她似乎不像个女诗人，更像一个心烦意乱的家庭主妇。

sentence.Network_en: You distract me. I've been distracted since the moment I met you. Because all I can think about is how much I want to kiss you.
sentence.Network_cn: 你害我分心。从遇见你的那一刻起，你就让我分心。因为我的脑海里满满都是想吻你的冲动。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... distract v 分散；使混乱 distracted a 心烦意乱的 extract v 抽出；提炼出.
丢字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 丢掉一双旧鞋〖 lose〗 丢魂失魄〖 distracted〗 丢荒〖 liewaste〗.
字典中超字的解释 ... (4) 远;遥远[ distant] (6) 惆怅,若有所失[ distracted] ◎ 超 chāo.
情人节：“我的眼里只有你” ... Participants： 参与者 Distracted： 分神的 Unconscious： 无意识的.

list.abs: 求关于“大学生就业问题”的英语作文 ... edge( 保持竟争地位). distractions( 分心，干扰). swarm( 蜂拥).
《Friends》词汇表B ... repeats n. 重复, 反复 distraction n. 娱乐, 分心, 分心的事物 poltergeist n. 敲击作响闹恶作剧的鬼.
分字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 分校〖 abranchschool,etc〗 分心〖 divertone'sattention;distract〗 分星掰两〖 clear;indetail〗.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... detractor n 毁谤者 distract v 分散；使混乱 distracted a 心烦意乱的.

entry.tran: 注意力分散的;思想不集中的;心烦意乱的
entry.def: If you are distracted, you are not concentrating on something because you are worried or are thinking about something else.

example.tran: 她看上去好像心烦意乱,真奇怪。

example.ex: She seemed less like a poetess than a distracted housewife.
example.tran: 她似乎不像个女诗人，更像一个心烦意乱的家庭主妇。

means.word_mean: 2. having the attention diverted especially because of anxiety

auth_sentence.content: I must have been distracted by all that fun.
auth_sentence.res_content: I must have been distracted by all that fun.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I must have been distracted by all that fun.

auth_sentence.content: It has been distracted by a lot of things.
auth_sentence.res_content: It has been distracted by a lot of things.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It has been distracted by a lot of things.

auth_sentence.content: The King was distracted by the most cruel incertitude.
auth_sentence.res_content: The King was distracted by the most cruel incertitude.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The King was distracted by the most cruel incertitude.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 心烦意乱的,精神不集中
stems_affixes.word_buile: distract[v.分心]+ed……的→adj.心烦意乱的,精神不集中
abs离开+tract拉→被拉开→心不在焉

stems_affixes.value_cn: 吸引人的,引人注意的;漂亮的,迷人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: attract[v.吸引]+ive……的→adj.吸引人的,引人注意的;漂亮的,迷人的
tract拉,拖,抽+or物器→拉的东西→拖拉机
attract[v.吸引]+ion表名词→n.吸引;吸引力;引力
con共同+tract拉,拖,抽→把二者[或以上]拉到一起,形成制约→[订]合同/契约,使缩小
at加强动作+tract拉→拉过来→吸引
con共同+tract拉,拖,抽→把二者[或以上]拉到一起,形成制约→[订]合同/契约,使缩小

Sentence.sentence: boys can focus on their lessons without being distracted

means.word_mean: 心烦意乱的,慌张失措的,错乱的

sentences.en: He was distracted with an unhappy love affair.
